title: Josehassen
author: VD
content_html:
It is impossible, we are assured by Dear Jorge, for the United States to deport 12 million illegal aliens. Now, he’s the president, so I suppose we have to assume that he knows what he’s talking about. No can do. But if we consider that the Germans managed to rid themselves of six million Jews, many of whom who spoke German and were pretty well integrated into German society, in only four years, basic math indicates that America could eliminate its entire illegal alien problem in eight years.

Given the creativity and productivity of the American people, I bet the job could be done in six.

On the other hand, perhaps we’d better keep them around. I have a feeling that sitting on the Cherry Blossom Throne is going to give the Lizard Queen a voracious appetite.

It is impossible, we are assured by Dear Jorge, for the United States to deport 12 million illegal aliens.  Now, he’s the president, so I suppose we have to assume that he knows what he’s talking about.  No can do.  But if we consider that the Germans managed to rid themselves of six million Jews, many of whom who spoke German and were pretty well integrated into German society, in only four years, basic math indicates that America could eliminate its entire illegal alien problem in eight years.
Given the creativity and productivity of the American people, I bet the job could be done in six.
On the other hand, perhaps we’d better keep them around.  I have a feeling that sitting on the Cherry Blossom Throne is going to give the Lizard Queen a voracious appetite.
